item.title: About me
item.description: Welcome to the blog! I’m Hugo, my background is in Psychology, more specifically, the area of face perception. Always eager to learn and after falling in love with R, I will blog mostly about data related topics(e.g. importing, wrangling, visualization, statistics). Not yet Machine Learning, I’m still learning. I want to share what I have been learning in R and try to help others to work with it. I also enjoy other things, non-data related, like history, tvshows, and literature, which I might blog about it.
